title: NERF RIVEN PLEASE!
body: TAKE OFF THE AD SCALING OR NERF THE DMG OF HER Q AND ULT IDK DO SOMEHTHING PLEASEEE I CRY EVRYTIEM

replies.body: They need to move the shield to her W instead of her E.
Riven is terrible ATM, you just got outplayed. She's at 43.9% winrate, 6th worst in the game as of right now. Bard has a better winrate than her.
She is like the most **_Balanced_** champion in the game atm. (only thing that would need a nerf is the scaling on her shield but even then that would just make her weak.)
The only thing she needs is a shield nerf and maybe some of her CC gutted. The damage is fine as long as there isn't as much utility to back it up like there is on Riven.
